item.title: EXC
item.description: score:165 Chances: ComEd was recognized with awards for its outstanding emergency recovery and assistance efforts in 2023, showcasing its reliability and efficiency in addressing power outages and emergencies. Exelon’s partnership with various organizations to promote energy-efficient and affordable housing units demonstrates a commitment to sustainability and community welfare.
